00027 #ifndef _INDIRECT_HEAP_H_
00028 #define _INDIRECT_HEAP_H_
00029 
00030 // Include 'less' comparison template (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00043 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
00044 class indirect_heap {
00045 protected:
00046 
00047   mutable const T *data; 
00048   idx *heap; 
00049   idx *inverse; 
00050 
00051   unsigned int size; 
00052   unsigned int used; 
00053   unsigned int last; 
00054 
00055   const Compare &compare; 
00056   static const idx root = 1; 
00057 
00058   inline idx parent_idx(idx index) { return index >> 1; } 
00059   inline idx left_idx (idx index) { return index << 1; } 
00060   inline idx right_idx(idx index) { return (index << 1) + 1; } 
00061 
00062   inline void swap_elements(idx i1, idx i2); 
00063   inline void heapify_element(idx index); 
00064   bool heapify_upwards(idx index); 
00065   void heapify_downwards(idx index); 
00066 
00067 public:
00068 
00069   // Constructors and destructors.
00070   indirect_heap(const T *data, unsigned int size, unsigned int maxSize = 0, const Compare &c = Compare());
00071   indirect_heap(const indirect_heap &heap);
00072   ~indirect_heap();
00073 
00074   // Assignment operator (only the heap structure is copied, not the data pointer).
00075   indirect_heap &operator = (const indirect_heap &heap);
00076 
00077   // Comparison operator (only heap structure is compared, not data pointers or data itself).
00078   bool operator == (const indirect_heap &heap) const;
00079 
00080   // Data pointer adjustment.
00081   void setData(const T *data); 
00082 
00083   // Usual heap operations.
00084   bool push(idx index); 
00085   T &pop(); 
00086 
00087   // Extended heap operations.
00088   bool inHeap(idx index) const; 
00089   bool remove(idx index); 
00090   bool update(idx index); 
00091   void updateAll(); 
00092   bool swap(idx index1, idx index2); 
00093 
00094   // Subscript operators.
00095   const T & operator [](idx index) const;
00096   T & operator [](idx index);
00097 
00098   // Heap properties.
00099   unsigned int maxSize() const;
00100   unsigned int dataSize() const;
00101   unsigned int count() const;
00102   bool empty() const;
00103   idx topIndex() const;
00104   T &top() const;
00105 };
00106 
00107 // Template implementation.
00108 #include "indirect_heap.cpp"
00109 
00110 #endif
